heroSection.empower: Empower Digital Innovation with Focus Groups
heroSection.description: Join the leading platform for conducting and participating in focus groups on digital products. Whether you're a researcher seeking valuable insights or a participant eager to share your opinions, Fokus Network connects you to the right opportunities.

videoSection.title: Transform Ideas into Success
videoSection.description: Leverage detailed insights from our focus groups to enhance your digital product strategy.

works.title: How It Works
works.description: Fokus Network streamlines the entire focus group process into simple,manageable steps:

cards.registerDescription: Create your profile and get matched with suitable projects.
cards.projectDescription: Define your project parameters and target audience.
cards.participantDescription: Our system matches participants based on your criteria
cards.sessionsDescription: Conduct insightful sessions with easy-to-use online tools.
cards.feedbackDescription: Collect and analyze feedback to drive your product innovation.

reviews.title: What Our Users Say
reviews.description: Hear from researchers and participants who have benefited from Fokus Network

footer.logoDesc: Stay updated with the latest from Fokus Network. Follow us on social media or contact us directly for any inquiries.
